content.detailedDescription: Driving home after classes at uri due west: took south road cut-through to get to 102 from route 1 and after slowing down greatly to take the turn in the light rain. it crossed perpendicular and i only had clear view for maybe 7-10 seconds and it was visible for maybe 30-45 seconds. flying extremely low and almost overhead was a disc shaped object that i confidently made out due to the pulsing light. every other second it seemed it lit up the neasrestsky in a circular radius to a dark shade of electric blue. it had 3 lights in a v shape pointing forward and was tailed a few hundred meters behind by a large plane at the same altitude. too dark to get any more details.
content.summary: Black disc, 3 red/yellow lights in a v pointing forwatd, pulsating blue

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on hwy 1 we stopped in the left turn lane at westmoreland blvd. waiting for the light we were the first car in line.

my wife noticed three objects in the sky coming towards us from about a 10:o,clock direction.

by the time the light changed four or five of these objects were out of sight to the left rear of the car with two or three coming into view.

we turned the corner and pulled off on a side street and got out to look.
by this time the last two spheres were still visible with one quite distant and the last over our position at an angle of about 75 degrees.

the sphere did not have external lights or any external objects period.
four of us were there and nobody heard a sound coming from the spheres.

the sphere was transparent in the upper half and a bright orange color in the lower section but not exactly half. the orange was in the center and tapperad down to the left and right.  the orange was not radiating or blinding or flashing but it did seem to provide a slight orange cast to the upper part of the sphere. it was obvious the the sphere was transparent.

after we got out of the car the last sphere was out of sight within about two minutes or less.

our first thoughts while stopped at the light was the bubble helicopters.
we rolled down the windows but could not here them. before we turned the corner we did not think they were helicopters because we could actually see into the spheres, and there wasn't any marker lights.

after we stopped on the quiet street we knew it was something else.

for me persolally there was no noise, no external lights, no external structure and no visable means of propulsion.

after seeing the above my comment was that our government does not have the technology to move a sphere through our athmosphere without control surfaces and a visable means of propulsion.

my second thought was that we saw eight or ten (different opinions)personal transporters with no visable weapontry or external anything. 

my next thoughts involved fear for my family, our country and our planent.

i personally feel that "nobody comes in peace "

my current feelings assure me that i did not see ufos, i saw alien transporters of some sort.

sorry about my drawing. i am better at describing then drawing.  

after thinking about what we saw, the distance and the height i believe the sphere could be 12 to 15 feet in diameter.

when asked about color i left it blank because of the "exterior stipulation."  all color came from the interior od the sphere.
content.summary: 10 spheres moving 100 plus mph, straight line, not equally spaced pass nearly over our heads.  no sound, no external lights, no additional structure.

content.detailedDescription: I live near the c&d canal, on the south side, just between chesapeake city and the summit bridge (rt 896).  last night, i was working at my desk in my bedroom at around 8pm, when my mother exclaimed that there was something really strange about the helicopter that just buzzed the house.  now, we live only a few miles down the road from summit aviation, a small local airstrip, and dover air force base, aberdeen proving ground, and philadelphia international airport are all in the region, so planes and helicopters flying over and near the house are not that uncommon.  heck, on a typical night, i can usually look up into the sky and see blinking lights from at least a dozen airplanes flying somewhere high in the sky.  so, i ignored her and kept working.  a few minutes later, the helicopter buzzed the house again, this time, only a couple hundred feet above the house.  she ran to the window and told me to look.  at first, as i got up, i listened and thought, "this is a coast guard, hh65 dolphin," but then i listened more closely, and decided the sound wasn't right; it was something else.  the helicopter flew by, and she asked me if i saw the red light in front of the helicopter.  i said i didn't see anything.  she described that roughly 4 to 8 helicopter-lengths in front of the helicopter, a glowing red light was visible.  now, we have seen plenty of helicopters, and so we know about the red, green, and white navigation lights they have.  but, she insisted that this wasn't one of those lights, and that it was away from the helicopter.  well, a few minutes later, the helicopter returned in the opposite direction (each time it flew by, it was traveling roughly east or west, then turning around after it flew out of sight a few miles away).  this time it was a bit farther away, about a half-mile behind the house, at the tree-line near the canal.  i couldn't see the red light she mentioned, but could definitely identify all the navigation lights on the helicopter.  a few minutes later, the helicopter flew past again in the opposite direction.  this time, i did see what she was talking about.  as she described, roughly 4-8 helicopter lengths in front of the helicopter, a small, glowing red light was visible.  it seemed constant in illumination, size, and intensity.  it was definitely not part of the helicopter; not one of the navigation lights.  it was not a spotlight, and no lights were being aimed at the ground (as if the helicopter was looking for something).  the red navigation light on the helicopter was blinking.  my first thought was that the red light ahead might be from some sort of near-infrared sensor, or lidar or something, some instrument on the helicopter that was illuminating the area ahead of the helicopter.  but, this didn't make sense, after i thought some more.  it was a cloudless night, so if a laser or some other light were being produced by the helicopter, there is no reason that a ball of red light would be visible at that distance in front of the helicopter, unless it were shining on something solid that was in front of the helicopter.  it was traveling perpendicular to our viewpoint, so it did not seem likely that any laser was being aimed directly at us by the helicopter.  maybe something was producing that light, that was in front of the helicopter?  i didn't know what it was, but i grabbed my camera and headed out to the back patio to see if i could take a picture on the next pass, if the helicopter came back.  about 8 minutes later it came past again, but farther away again, near the canal, so i couldn't get a good picture.  i waited outside for another 15 minutes, but the helicopter never returned.  it continued off to the east, roughly in the direction of the summit bridge.  about 10 minutes after i lost sight of it, i saw a dim white light moving in a non-linear path, miles away near the horizon near the bridge, but after 15 seconds of moving to the left, then a little up, then back right, then up, it vanished.  i noted that it was near the horizon, because the nearby shadows of the treeline were useful in noticing that it wasn't simply moving in a straight line like a plane would.  in total, my mother said it passed back and forth 8 times in the hour.  we also could not think of a reason why at this time of night, a helicopter would make so many passes over the house, and some of them very low (less than 500 feet), in such a strange pattern, unless it was expressly following the red light.  we both felt very strange about the sighting.  we see airplanes and helicopters all the time, but this was strange, and we had never seen an aircraft apparently following a red light.  the following day (this morning), my mother talked with one of her coworkers, and her coworker also noticed 3 helicopters, in the vicinity, at roughly the same time of night, while driving her children home from a child's birthday party.
content.summary: Helicopter following glowing red light in multiple passes near home.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to feed my hourse its was about 7:10pm tuesday the 14 2012.I went down the hill fed my horse stayed a few mintues with horse then walked and i looked over to the horizon i saw a red blinking lite then 5 or 6 just winked on then there was just one i kept looking to see if there was a tower or something to cause that.I kept stairing then i got scared and ran up the hill to the house.
last summer think it was july 2011 about 1am i was laying down on the couch when i saw a large expolsion of white light it was so bright it lite the whole area outside
content.summary: I saw right above the horizon where the mountain range is bright red lights first one red light then alot of them 5 or 6 they just blinked on then off to one red light

content.detailedDescription: As i was going into work tuesday morning, when i stoped at the corner of onodaga rd & holt rd i was facing north (befor turning onto holt rd)i glanced to the west and from my angle i would say what i saw was over waverly rd between holt rd & m99 and pretty much following that route going north. it only lasted about 5-10 seconds max but it was a bright blue light streaking across the sky and just befor it disapeared there was a bright white flash on its tail the it was gone. i have seen a meteorite come into the atmospher and burn up befor, that was a bright red fire ball with a redish yellow flash upon disintigration. this acted the same but the colors were all wrong. did anyone else see this besides me? call me and i'll tell ya about the fireball (meteorite?)because i could never find anyone who would admit to seeing it either. that was in 2007 i think.
content.summary: Looked like a meteorite but, do they look like a bright blue light that flashes white for a couple seconds befor disapearing?

content.detailedDescription: I have a glass window in my front door, which faces east.  i was walking by the door and i noticed headlights in the sky.  i backed up and stared.  i moved my head around as i thought it might be a reflection, i wear glasses.  no, it was still in the sky.  i stared at this for awhile, thinking all kinds of things, but pretty sure  what i was seeing was in fact a ufo.  it started to turn south, and as it did so, i noticed something like fins or something on the side and as it completed the turn, there was a blinking red light on the bottom, near the end, but 10 or so feet from the end.  there was a full moon that night or bright, because i noticed the reflection of the moon on the thing.  after the turn was completed, it went a few 100 feet and disappeared.  poof, gone!  i ran out of the door and could find, nor see anything.  called the 911, but no one else reported seeing anything.  how could they not, it was 7:30 in the evening, people were driving on highway 41, less than a half mile east of my house.  i remember i kept thinking, surely people are going to stop and look at this thing, no one did.  so, was i crazy.  i sat and thought this a bit and wrote down the day and time and drew a picture so i wouldn't forget, not that i will as i can still see it as clear as the night i saw it.
content.summary: Looks like the ufo on tv special ufo over illinois., the one with two headlights.I

content.detailedDescription:
It's around 7pm 2-15-12 went out back looked up into the as always since my stargazing hobbie got very exciting 10 months ago i believe was my 1st sighting & wasn't my last.
iam out back looked up northwest saw this formation of stars in sky (seen before) and underneath it is a very huge glowing and flikering bright red blue orange star-like object so i set up camera again to capture it & it started to fly up never did that before.I looked around notice above me there was 2 of them flying across the the sky at a very fast and unusual way trying to capture it on video there were too fast,gone.I attempted to record the run away star-like object as i was doing that i i noticed another flying object maybe 20ft from roof top heading in my direction i looked behind me there was another one & the next thing i saw on the right side coming huge bright red and blue lights & flew by it was between my house and the neighbors house it had humming sound i told my boyfriend it looked like a huge potato with strange looking lights on it very strange it was just 10-20 ft above roof top if not closer.Never seen anything like it.At this point i stopped recording because i felt like they knew was recording them a didn't like it.That was my feeling.So go to my front porch sat there and watch couple more passing by.I go to brothers house across town told him what i saw so he comes outside w/me and they were everywhere   explainable flying very low objects some stop and hoovered around.I'am at my brothers house telling him what i've seen already at my house so i took him outside to let him see for himself,they were everywhere more than i saw at my it was crazy.So i decided to stay a little longer to see what i can catch on video i realized they just kept coming what seems like around me like if they didn't want me recording them so i stop went inside for sec then went back outside i told myself iam tripping so i continued to record i sat on porch i'am on second floor is i noticed this huge bright object coming up right behind this huge tree that sits on neighbors side as i looked thru the camera i realized it wasn't just one it had buddies this thing wasn't far from me just next door behind big tree i freaked out cause as i watching this thing at 1st i had heard humming sound then nothing and one min it was huge bright weird shape object then red then gone then it appeared again at one point i heard that humming sound again like it was about to take off.Well that freaked the hell out of me i ran inside told my brother what had happened we went back outside w/camera in hand and as i looked thru the camera i noticed this strange object and decided to zoom in on it to get a better look and that is what this video is so you tell me what u think it is ..............Remember iam on second floor.
content.shape: Blimp,   Diamond,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Several lights looked like possible planes at 1st but noticed some would sit & hoover around & even fly by close together & above tree top,odd shape & lights & light humming sound

content.detailedDescription: I was heading east when i saw what first appeared to be helicopter, however on approach i noticed that there were no flashing lights. i stopped my vehicle at the top of a high point in the road with my windows down and shut off my motor. as the object got closer i was in near direct path of it. as it went over just ahead of my vehicle (if i had to guess between 400-500ft above) i realized it was triangular in shape. it had white lights on all three sides and i could see all three sides as if it were on an slight axis. there were very low clouds due to heavy rain, it made no sound and was headed in a north west direction at a steady rate of speed. i saw no stars in the night sky, not even the moon, it was heavy overcast which on approach lead my to believe it was a helicopter. i am not 100% but it appeared to be moving in a slow, steady rotational motion as it went by in a direct line. i tried to follow it but it was heading in a direction i was not able to follow, nw. all roads in the area are east west, north south.
content.summary: Triangular shaped, under clouds (rainy night),no sound, blue glow coming from center

content.detailedDescription: It was early morning on feb 7th and i was headed to my local gym. as i was driving northeast down the road i happen to notice 3 white lights in a triangular form floating in the sky just below the cloud covering. this morning was especially cloudy and very low ceiling. at first i dismissed the lights as reflection and i was somewhat tired, but then the lights moved to my left rather smoothly in the same uniform shape... this caught my attention immediately. i pulled into the parking lot while continuing to observe the object at this point stationary over an adjacent apartment building, i focused my attention to the objects shape which appeared to be an exact sided triangle however seems transparent/translucent body. the object made absolutely no sound and then slowly ascended into the clouds. i had then got back into my vehicle and tried to follow the object by driving down the nearest street near the apartment but unfortunately couldn't find it. for the next few days i've been trying to make sense of what i had seen and being very familiar with most air craft and living close to an airport this object did not resemble anything i had ever seen. i had even tried duplicating this experience by creating the same sort of environment within my vehicle at the same time of day, verifying this was not an internal reflection, nor anti collision lights above the apartment, etc... this was to what i believe was an unidentified craft to which i have never encountered in my life.
content.summary: 3 white lights in triangular form hovering below cloud cover, no noise, transparent object

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house on the way out to work when i noticed the lights on the general direction of homestead air force base. they were moving on different directions in a zig zag motion... really weird, definitely not an aircraft. took a picture with my iphone and ran inside the house to get a real camera, by the time i came back they were already gone... time elapsed was aprox. 30 secs.
content.summary: Glowing light

content.detailedDescription: Around 4am i went outside to have a cigar on my back deck, i normally look up at the stars nightly so when i saw at what appeared to be an orange star, it caught my eye,seeing as ive never noticed it before. as i watched it it slowly started to drift, then suddenly banked right, accellerated downwards and then back to its original position. when it first moved i assumed it was a satelite taking an evasive action to possibly avoid floatsom, but its movements became far too eratic, to even be the highest quality of jet. about 20 minutes later i went inside to tell a friend what i was looking at, then returned outside to watch for a few more minutes. when i realized more northeast there was another object of similar design. i looked to the original and it appeared to have a triangular shape now. coming from south east i thought i saw a fast moving jet begin an ascending arc towards the object, but suddenly its lights blacked out. i assume to hide its presense from both us and the object. i then looked back towards the second object and realized it was now also movnig eratically, and then vanished from sight. i came back inside and my friend was now also watching and said he could hear what sounded like several helicopters in the distance, be described them as being too low pitch to be commercial craft. i tried to take a video of the event, but my phones low quality camera, and its inability to shut off the flash system made it impossible. a few minute after the jet blacked out the object stopped moving. and has yet to move. personally i think the jet may have attempted to intercept object 1, and thereby scared object 2 off. and perhaps through the interception disabled the craft from being able to maneuver or perhaps it stopped to blend with the stars again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Possibly witnessed atmospheric entry

content.detailedDescription: I went to blanket my horses with two of my dogs. i looked up like i always do and noticed nothing in particular. after completing the blanketing of 5 horses i started back to the house, i looked up and said to myself wow, i don't think i have ever in my life seen so many stars. i starred at them when i noticed a star move quickly to the left, miles to the left then it dropped downwards, i stopped walking, my one dog stood on the right of me the other to the left of me. we starred up at the sky i noticed an object coming over the roof of the house, extremely slow as taking its time, i noticed it since there were millions of stars all around but not within this extremely large oval. once it stopped i saw other circles underneath moving in all different directions, meanwhile i didn't move nor did my dogs. it slowly moved sideways to the next lot went slowly forward tilted upwards at an angle and was gone in a snap but i could see vapor trails and then all the stars disappeared. later in the night i heard an apache helicopter over my house i went outside and no lights were on i said i hear you were are you, then they lite me up hovered me for awhile then followed the exact pattern this ufo did, they then followed the path and landed in the street with their lights off. i saw people running through the desert with flashlights, they closed the roads, trucks were driving down the street with no lights on for months after i kept seeing a silver government car seemed to be following me for a few months. cows did live in the field were the helicopter landed nd there hasn't been any cows there since. i know what isaw and it was real. my two dogs saw it too.
content.summary: It fell from the sky then hovered over me and my dogs transparent stars around but not in the oval shaped area then slowly went on a path angeled and vanished into the stars

content.detailedDescription: 4 army privates driving car at night on rural road from san antonio back to camp bullis.  their engine unexpectadly died and everything electrical faded out.  they also saw a car up ahead which was simultaneously experiencing the same.  then, a large ufo was seen over the tree tops at a height of approx. 100 feet moving slowly from left to right.   as ufo got farther away, electrical activity gradually resumed.  car
content.summary: 4 army private driving at night on rural road saw large ufo which caused vehicle interference

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving to mcdonalds, they were big and bright it was hard not to see them , its like they slapped me in the face, my husband said they were planets, i told him they were not planets because planets would move with the moon, and they didnt move when we drove and they were on my left side, i was driving, they further we drove down the road they were behind us so i knew then they were not stars or anything like that, and then when i got to the end of the road, they crossed the road and disappeared, i was terrified and when we seen them i slowed down to get a good look and people were outside their houses looking as well. they were big orangish yellowish red light like orb things, and they made a zig zag pattern they were huge , they kind of looked like street lights in the sky, this is my first time ever seeing ufo like this, i have seen some that werent this color and seen some that flew over my house back n forth and flashed blue red and white lights and they also split into 3 parts, thought it was a plane at first until it split. i look outside all the time for ufo now that i have a camera i hope to catch some photos, i have tried before but its like it would hide behind the tree line where i could not see.!!!
content.summary: About 10 to 15 orb like objects

content.detailedDescription: I came out on my back deck. i looked up st the sky on the clear night to look at the stars. the light came over the roof of my house, heading east to west. it was extremely bright, and that is what caught my attention. i have seen the space station, and i thought that was what i was seeing. then it stopped moving, moved to the left, then moved to the right,. i went into my house to get my man to come and see. when he came out it made a curve pattern, paused than shot off.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A light like a very bright star flew over the house ,stopped  pattern across the sky satalite quick stopped

content.detailedDescription: I saw two sets of strange clouds formations when stopped at a stop sign. i grab my phone and took a photo on my blackberry. over a month later i transferred the photo to my pc. it was then that i noticed a set of dark objects in the same format as the set of two strange cloud objects. (see photo)
content.summary: Just noticed the pair of dark objects after blowiog up the photo of the set of two strange cloud objects

content.detailedDescription:
Monday february 13, i was returning home having picked up my daughter from a school function around 8:30 pm. as we pulled into our subdivision i noticed directly in front of me what i thought was a plane. i noticed the light configuration was a little different than normal and it was fairly low but other than that i didn't think much of it. it had two strobe type lights on what i assumed were the wing tips and one red light in the center. the white strobe lights blinked a couple of times per second and the red light blinked at a slow but steady frequency. again, i really didn't think much of it but i did notice that it banked to the right and up. i thought that was a little odd but i didn't suspect anything out of the ordinary. as i drove through the neighborhood, i caught another glance of it off to the right and i could tell it was making a looping type circle around the neighborhood. this raised my curiosity. i was trying to figure out why the pilot was making maneuvers in a residential area at night. 

when i arrived at the house, i waited for my daughter to remove some items from the car before i got out. i still had the aircraft in mind so i stood outside the car and waited to see if i could view it again. i didn't see it or hear it. as i was about to go inside, i looked up and saw it was flying right over my house heading in a westerly direction. from the back, the two wing tip lights were a amber type color, where before they were strobes (at least from the front). almost the color of a street lamp but not as bright. i could still see the red light on the bottom. the sky that night was partly cloudy, some parts of the sky were clear, while other parts had a cloudy overcast look. i realized looking at the aircraft that i couldn't discern the shape. i was only able to see the lights. the direction it was flying was going to take it directly underneath a blanket of clouds. i assumed once it was under the clouds, it would contrast and i would see the shape. it flew under the clouds but for whatever reason i still couldn't see what the shape was. i could clearly see the lights but could not see what they were attached to. at that time it immediately made a hard bank to the left. now i could see a red light on top as well as on the bottom. the strange part about it was the red lights on top and bottom seemed to be almost touching giving the appearance that it was very thin. there seemed to be very little structure between the two lights. i didn't hear any sound from the aircraft, however the night was chilly and the heating units in the neighborhood were running, so i can't be sure.  

i'm not sure what i saw, but it was definitely different.
content.summary: Craft making maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: I was going home after a valentines meal.My wife found an object in the sky and said its falling down or crashing.It did not look like a flight or helicopter but it was very bright object.I was on i-35 n/i-80 e between clive and urbandale.
content.summary: Emitting bright lights weird shape.

content.detailedDescription:
Strange orange lights, over city of castellet i la gornal - l'arbo���
pass helicopter 10 minutes before observation
content.summary: Strange orange lights, spheres

content.detailedDescription: On feb 12 2012 at 11 am my daughter caught a close up of a ufo when she was returning home it was captured between richmond tx and wharton tx.
content.summary: Daughter caught close up of ufo

content.detailedDescription: Granddaughter spotted object,then i observed it.Asked wife to get camera. took 3 photos,1 in focus,2 i tried to zoom in while it moved to the west.Those pics show 2 orbs kind of fuzzy.1st pic taken when stopped.1st pic has full moon in left of shot
content.summary: Came from n over providence,stoped then went west

content.detailedDescription:
From my apartment window overlooking southwest utah county observed two orange/yellow fireballs about five minutes apart slowly ascending in the sky. my girlfriend and i observed the same type of object a few days previously about 40 miles away in west valley city (flying over valley fair mall).

both fireballs seemed to originate from close to ground-level starting above the city of palmyra, utah (appx. 40.148832,-111.719799). they ascended gradually in the air at roughly a 35 degree angle. i'm guessing the objects were 10-20 feet in diameter. 

the first object headed due north and reached an altitude of approximately 10-15,000 feet (slightly higher than half the altitude of commercial jets that frequently fly above the path of the these two objects). after approximately two minutes i lost sight of the first object as it passed behind trees a few yards from my balcony.

the second object seemed to arise from the same area traveling somewhat north, northeast. it flew for about 3/4 of the distance as the first object but abruptly faded and vanished. 

i would estimate their speed to be faster than a twin-engine plane or transport military helicopter, but traveled about as fast as the life-flight helicopter which frequently flies in the same area to and from utah valley regional medical center.

i was able to record the object with a sony dcr-trv11 digital video camera. the objects looked to be active balls of flame changing colors from orange to yellow. there were no blinking lights and no other observable lights coming from the object.
content.summary: Ufo fireball over provo, utah

content.detailedDescription: On feb 12 2012 at approx 11:20 am my 10 year old daughter caught a snapshot of a ufo up close. the photo was taken between richmond tx and wharton tx. my 10 year old daughter was taking pictures with her camera and i told her to stop because the clicking from the camera was well you know. anyhow she stoped and when she  went scrolling through the pictures she yelled and started to cry because she was terrified at what she saw. i immediatley looked and was astonished by what she had came across it took me a couple a days to sink in what was captured. so now i just build enough courage to share this amazing close up photo with the world. i do have to original photo and storage disk available.
content.summary: 10 year old daught caught close up photo with camera

content.detailedDescription:
I did not witness this sighting, and i am submitting this report on behalf of my significant other.  on february 14, 2012 at approximately 10:50 pm (cst) she was on our balcony, in forest park, having a cigarette and facing east when she saw a cluster of black objects emerge over a building in oak park.  at first she thought the black cluster might be balloons ��� more then 10, maybe 20.  the cluster suddenly disappeared and then she saw one round black object take their place.  it was matte black (not reflective), had no lights and made no sound.  it appeared to be about the same size as a helicopter.

the object was solid, had a round /orb-like shape, with something spinning on top ��� almost like a rotor.  she has worked in the airline industry for about 20 years, and she is sure this was not a helicopter ��� the shape isn���t the same and moved faster than a helicopter.  the only thing it had in common with a helicopter is some sort of spinning device on top that ���reminded��� her of a propeller. 

the black object wobbled slightly for only a few seconds as it ascended diagonally, going north by northeast (starting at 30��� to about 70��� or less).    it corrected the wobble and traveled below the cloud cover at a very high rate of speed, maintaining a consistent, intentional path.  the object disappeared into the clouds, and she said it was much faster than any craft she is familiar with.  she was very stunned by the lack of noise, and that it had no lights or strobes.  the entire sighting lasted around a minute or so.  attached is a drawing of the object that i made, by her direction.

she did not notice any other commercial traffic in the sky during the time of her sighting.  

i have also seen objects in this neighborhood, most recently as january 7, 2012 (case numbers 34704/34690), retired as ���unknown��� by your field investigator.

we have not reported this sighting to the police.  if you have any questions i included her e-mail address on the sighting form.
content.summary: Black sphere - no lights, no sound, something spinning on top

content.detailedDescription: Orange spheres
content.summary: Orange spheres

content.detailedDescription:
This was years for obvise reasons. we lived in the woods on 5 acres. on a rainy northwest night 9:30 or so, whole house started to pulse from a helicopter. my wife and i thought was going to crash into house it was so loud and pulseating badly. we had a lot of fir trees on propety and around area from 150- 200 + ft saw object just enough to know that not normal. craft was flying 15 ft from side of chinook helicopter as fast as the helo could travel.125knots craft was glowing slightly. the directoin and where they were going was obvious around mt pilcuck or around that area. a few days later i was at home sick and just walking out side to get some fresh air and heard what must have been a giant amp the largest in the world start coming alive. the low level noise stayed on for about 15-30 sec. i know thats the sound from what other people have told me (ex-military). about a month later on the same type of night rainy overcast and at treetop level they flew over again slightly to the east by 400 yards. of a swath of 56 acres. saw nothing just heard helicopter again. a month later observed lights hovering in sky tree top level with rotating red green blue light veiwed thru a pair of 10x50 binoculars. called wife and daughter to look they being practical just said i dont know what that is and walked away.
(thanks dear) the rotating lights stopped and the white lite stayed observed for 40 min it stayed staitnary, the light dimed, might be because i shined a large spotlight in that area direction. i tryed to call neihbor and no anser (he was pissed, at him self) after this sighting nothing else did we see while we lived there. having worked in covert operations new phones were being monitored, if you picked up and started yelling about what you just saw well. dont like being yelled at. and have a daughter.
1984 worked on aircraft till present.
content.summary: Flying wing

content.detailedDescription: Around 7 pm, i walked outside to have a smoke and talk to friend that lives a few houses away from me.  as i made myself comfortable in an adirondack  chair and waiting for him to pick up the phone, i noticed a very bright object on the sky and that it was moving.  as soon as my friend answered, i told him so he and his wife could go outside and watch (his wife loves star gazing)but almost immediately as soon as they looked at it, it stopped moving.  the next few minutes were a back and forth of "is it moving?  yeah, i think it is...Wait no, it's not...No wait, it looks like it's movi--no, i guess not..." suddenly, two more bright (slightly less brighter than the first object)appeared out of nowhere--they didn't appear to fly to this spot, they just suddenly lit up.  the next few minutes were spent watching the three objects clearly interacting with each other. moving back and forth almost perfectly in sync.  after seven or eight minutes, one of the two that appeared last took off to the ese slowly and turned sharply to the s at a high rate of speed, followed moments later by the other object that it appeared with.  the original object hung around and meandered for about five minutes more, before taking off from a dead stop to unbelievably fast speed.  amazing!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Mistaken as iss first, witnessed (with neighbors) ufos hover, then move back and forth. then left at high speed...Incredible!

content.detailedDescription: i was on my back deck grilling dinner for my girlfriend and me. i first noticed the object when i was casually observing venus towards the southwest. next to venus was what i thought to be a star at first. when i noticed it was moving i became interested. i didn't know what it was at first. as it got closer to me, at the closest point almost right over head, i noticed that it didn't move like anything i'd ever seen in the sky before. it was slow, and seemed like it was light as air. it bobbed and weaved (subtly) and at one point came to a brief stand still before resuming course. it was yellowish gold/orange. it made no sound whatsoever. it passed overhead all the way to the ene horizon and then vanished from my view. my girlfriend is the second witness. i was extremely excited during this experience. i've wanted to see a ufo ever since i was a little kid. when i realized what i was seeing wasn't a plane, helicopter, meteor, or a satellite, i became as elated as if i'd won the lottery. after 4 to 5 minutes of watching this thing, it just disappeared from my sight like a plane does. it simply got too far away for me to see it any longer.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From the se towards ene slowly. accelerated and deccelerated, subtle zig-zags and one almost full stop. as bright and large as venus.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of my house smoking a cigarette before going to dinner with my parents. i was sitting on my porch and happened to see an orange orb in the sky. when i first noticed the object, i thought it was the planet venus, but then quickly disregarded that thought because the light being emitted was far to bright to be from a planet or star. the orange orb started about 25 degrees above the tree line then slowly descended to right above the tree line. this still being probably a mile or more from where i was standing it was hard to say though. the object then began to move from left to right at a pretty fast pace quicker than any aircraft that fly through the area. to my best guess the object began slowing down as it crossed over where the interstate is located and began doing something i have never seen. my best description of what the object was doing was projecting a very thin white line with a small ball of white light attached. the weirdest thing about it though was when the orange orb began projecting this light, it seemed to happen like as if i were watching an old time 1900's movie:very choppy or almost flashing. the next thing that happened was my father opening the garage door so i turned around to go get my father and show him this thing because i couldn't believe what i was seeing. before i told my father, what was going on i looked back to see if the orange orb was still there and i am still dumbfounded as to where the object went. i took my eyes off of the light for 5 seconds max and it was gone. i decided not to tell my parents about the sighting for fear of ridicule, and have tried to dismiss the event myself, but i have yet to come up with and answer for what i observed on feb. 14. might i also note that i live 15 miles from charlotte douglas airport and live in an area when every type of commercial aircraft fly day and night. this object was no aircraft it did not strobe emergency lights, there were no additional lights other than the orb, and the fact that there was no sound is also rather peculiar.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange ball of light almost looked like the planes venus only brighter moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was facing north on 3700 cottage grove avenue in des moines ia.  the object appeared eastward bright in the sky.  the object moved slowly but in a straight path.  the object resembled an orb emitting a white/red glow.  the object was at the same level of the stratus clouds and moved in-sequence with the pace of the stratus cloud.  the orb's light faded until it dissolved.
content.summary: White/red orb
